BeyondOurReachModSettings.ModSettingDef.settingLabel: [Vanilla Trading Expanded] Add a Kwazaari Bank.
BeyondOurReachModSettings.ModSettingDef.settingDesc: With this enabled, you will get a truly dwarven bank that will extort you for all you have.
Makes it possible to substitute Glitterworld Medicine in any recipe with medicine from Beyond Our Reach.

BeyondOurReachModSettings.ModSettingDef.settingLabel: [Omni Core Drill] Integrate Omni Core Drill into Beyond Our Reach Lore.
BeyondOurReachModSettings.ModSettingDef.settingDesc: With this integration, Omni Core Drill will be retextured, moved to pre-solar tier of technology, cost a lot of Solar resources, and use far more power (also with RePowered).

BeyondOurReachModSettings.ModSettingDef.settingLabel: [Without Combat extended] Add new mortar shell variants.
BeyondOurReachModSettings.ModSettingDef.settingDesc: Adds ultra tech level mortar shells that can be used to bombard the enemies.

BeyondOurReachModSettings.ModSettingDef.settingLabel: [ArchotechExpanded] Allow to make Nano-, Pico- and Attomachinery from Nano-, Pico- and Femto-clusters.
BeyondOurReachModSettings.ModSettingDef.settingDesc: Adds recipes allowing to use Archotech Expanded's materials as ingredients for Beyond Our Reach's similar materials.

BeyondOurReachModSettings.ModSettingDef.settingLabel: [ArchotechExpanded] Add new research for Archotech Expanded bionics.
BeyondOurReachModSettings.ModSettingDef.settingDesc: Bionics from Archotech Expanded will now require a new Archotech-level research to be built; Archotech Mimicry research will be also integrated into the tree.
Rebalances the Archotech Bench around the Beyond Our Reach Lore and materials, making it more expensive to build and use.
Removes the possibility to build the nano-, pico- and attomachinery and changes the recipes to use the BOR's nano-, pico-, and femtoclusters instead.

BeyondOurReachModSettings.ModSettingDef.settingLabel: [ArchotechExpanded] Remove stuff properties from Archotech Expanded -machinery.
BeyondOurReachModSettings.ModSettingDef.settingDesc: Archotech Expanded materials - the nano-, pico- and attomachinery will no longer be usable as build materials - patch is useful to prevent yourself from building indestructible stuff.

BeyondOurReachModSettings.ModSettingDef.settingLabel: [Save Our Ship 2] Add Save Our Ship Hypoxia resistance to BOR Lungs.
BeyondOurReachModSettings.ModSettingDef.settingDesc: Will attempt to add Hypoxia resistance to Solar, Quasar, Tenebral and Umbral lungs.

BeyondOurReachModSettings.ModSettingDef.settingLabel: [Save Our Ship 2] Add Save Our Ship EVA capability to BOR Armors.
BeyondOurReachModSettings.ModSettingDef.settingDesc: Adds EVA capability to BOR armors, as well as Royalty-added BOR armors and Rimsenal-added BOR armors.

BeyondOurReachModSettings.ModSettingDef.settingLabel: [Royalty] Add Royalty-like permits to Kwazaari faction.
BeyondOurReachModSettings.ModSettingDef.settingDesc: With this integration, Kwazaari will utilize the Shattered Empire's honor system with their own "honor" - scrip, permits and scrip trader.

Adds Solar, Quasar and Tenebral tiers of Royalty armors (Prestige Recon, Prestige Marine, Cataphract and Prestige cataphract) and allows them to be used with Royal Titles. Kwazaar Bazaar will get a heavy marine variant.
